description: This dessert is packed with chocolate and plenty of crunch, with the freshness of orange.
name: Chocolate Orange & Macadamia Biscuit Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium orange, keep all zest and 4 tbs of juice

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pan to a medium heat to combine and melt all the chocolate butter, syrup, zest and juice together.
While this is melting, prepare your dessert bowl by sprinkling some water around the inside and then covering the inside with cling film and push against edges.
Now combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl and then thansfer to your serving bowl. Cover and allow to set in the fridge for 2 hours before serving.
